local_intent: Align to the cloth right edge and perform a leftward push with a brief settle and visibility check, retrying the push once if needed.
assumptions: Safe to push without additional lowering; contact already established or light contact acceptable
coherence_with_global: Preserves perception fallback, aligns yaw to 90, approaches the right edge, executes a 0.1m push at 180 degrees with short wait, matching the transfer phase of the global plan.
